item.description:
I'm sorry, I had to change the time to 12:30 because I forgot that I signed Molly up for obedience class on Saturdays! I hope everyone can still make it! If another time the same day is better for you, I please let me know.


Hi! This is the first event for this group, so I hope some folks sign up and can make it! I chose Salem Willows, but I am open to suggestions.

Also, it is short notice (especially since there are no other members yet and it's one week away), but if necessary, I'll postpone until July.

I hope to meet all you Cavaliers and your owners soon!

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel June Meetup
